atk1-text: Roll STR + TR vs. STR + SR against an adjacent insect. The target gains wounds and is pushed 1 for each net success. If the insect collides with another insect, both take 1 wound.
atk2-text: Roll SPE + TR vs. SPE + SR against an adjacent insect. The target gains wounds equal to the net successes. On a success, you move up to your SPE.
atk3-text: Land on the ground beneath you and roll STR + Flight. Each insect within a number of hexes equal to your successes must roll SPE + SR to resist, taking damage equal to the of net successes.
atk4-text: Roll Venom + TR vs. STR + SR against an adjacent insect. The target gains Wounds and Infected equal to the net successes.
